column1:
The overall negative sentiment percentages of Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services, General, and Value have been reported as follows:

Cleaniness: 28.978335%
Amenities: 18.600%
Location: Not available
Services: 27.099861%
General: 27.929362%
Value: 32.265873%

Suggestions on what can be done to improve in each aspect are as follows:

Cleaniness: Increase the level of hygiene to reduce negative sentiment.
Amenities: Increase the number of amenities available to reduce negative sentiment.
Location: Ensure that the location is accessible enough to reduce negative sentiment.
Services: Improve services to reduce negative sentiment.
General: Improve overall experience to reduce negative sentiment.
Value: Make sure that the value for money is satisfactory to reduce negative sentiment.
